title: UX Crash Course: User Psychology
excerpt: My mission for 2014 was to get more people started in User Experience (UX) Design. In January, hundreds of thousands of people did the original UX Crash Course and it was translated into Spanish, Portuguese and Korean by amazing volunteers. In May we continued with a User Psychology lesson every day.

title: The Surprising Psychology of Dieting and Plate Design
excerpt: New research is challenging long-held assumptions about how our eyes influence our stomachs.

title: 15 Steps to Understand & Influence User Behavior: A Deep Dive
excerpt: Understanding user behavior is key to understanding how users interact with your product. Here are 15 steps to analyze & change their interactions to your benefit.
